appDesc.message: Save words from web pages for later learning

ankiText.message: Click export and choose the Anki option. Save the file as a text file and then in Anki, click the Import button and select this downloaded text file. You can then choose which file fields correspond to which language in your card deck.

csvText.message: Click export and choose the CSV option. Save the text file with the extension '.csv' and open the file with a csv reader like excel

aboutText.message: Word Bank was created with the aim to make it easier for language learners to save words they come across online for later learning. To quickly add new words, you can highlight the word and then right-click and select the Word Bank menu item.
